entity.name: COVID-19: Public health updates
entity.description: Information on how to take care of yourself and others from authorities and public officials.

text: Tomorrow we take the first small steps out of lockdown. But we must exercise care and caution and stick to the rules - the virus has not gone away. Before you arrange to meet up - outdoors - with friends/family, PLEASE read the @scotgov guidance https://t.co/yehO9a3HRD 🙏
